feature1.explanation: Both texts show similar use of punctuation, such as quotation marks and commas, in a coherent manner.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical and grammatical features, including word choice and sentence structure, suggesting a common writing style.

feature3.explanation: The sentence structures and quantitative features exhibit resemblance in complexity and coherence, contributing to the likelihood of the same author.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a similar narrative style and tone, indicating a commonality in discourse features.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text, indicating consistency in this aspect.

overall.explanation: Considering the alignment in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the texts are likely written by the same author.
